name: Pokedex in Notion
description: Capture them all inside Notion.Not a typical Pokemon database. Pokedex in Notion is a powerful tool that transforms your Notion setup into a dynamic, interactive Pokedex. With just a few clicks, you can easily import and organize your Pokemon collection, track stats, and so much more.Do you love Notion and Pokemon? Do you struggle with keeping track of your collection and stats?Imagine having a custom Pokedex within Notion, with all your Pokemon organized, stats tracked, and more.With Pokedex in
